summary: triple or double loot from boss chests.
descriptionHtml:
Keep getting pathetic drops from chests?  wish the you had a chance of decent loot from chests without breaking the game?  This mod is for you!



This mod works, by sneaking into dungeons before you enter them, calming the chest, and placing two more sets of loot inside.  It requires no feeding, and only occasional baths.






items in the chest essentially \"roll\" for 4 or 5 items to decide if you get the items, and which items you get.

This mod simply makes the chest roll twice more (adding a chance for loot each time).


You should receive three times the normal loot from chests (same exact possibilities from loot, but three times the amount)


(example:

without mod:

1 armor (85% chance)
1 weapon (85% chance)
30 gold (100% chance)


with mod:

1 armor (85% chance)
1 armor (85% chance)
1 armor (85% chance)
1 weapon (85% chance)
1 weapon (85% chance)
1 weapon (85% chance)
30 gold (100% chance)
30 gold (100% chance)
30 gold (100% chance)
)



edit:  added a 2x loot version.


happy looting




be sure to check out my other game-balancing mods.
author: jmanoray
